title: (x) Institute of Hindu Arts unicase logo - FF Disturbance {Stephen}
content:
If someone could tell me what font is used here, that would be awesome! Thanks

 [‹ very wide and bold stencil sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203185010/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18346 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ben & Jerry's slab serif - custom font {Tim D} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203185010/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: laurabachman

comments.content: Jeremy Tankard’s [FF Disturbance](http://web.archive.org/web/20071203185010/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.6621.3.8&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=institute+hindu&sampleSize=48) — one of my favorite unicase faces.
where did you find that hindu art font? I would like to check out their entire identity.
